name: Modern Threads Silky Soft Microfiber and Wrinkle Free Sheets - Luxurious Microfiber Bed Sheets Includes Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet with Deep Pockets, & Pillowcases Ivory, Full
short_description: A Contemporary & Luxurious Rose-Printed Sheet Set: Drape your bed in our supple microfiber rose-printed sheet set and enhance your bedding with an elegant upgrade. Made with 100% microfiber polyester, our 4-piece full set sheets set includes a flat sheet, a fitted sheet with deep pockets, and two pillowcases. Perfect for your bedroom or guest room, layer them with a comforter or duvet of your choice and add a vibrant accent to your décor. Crafted With Incredibly Soft Microfiber Polyester: Ever wished you could take those superbly soft sheets from your hotel room and lay them on your own bed? We wanted to replicate that quality with our microfiber brushed yarns and breathable blend of cotton and polyester. Immerse yourself in tranquility every time you lay your head down at night. Designed To Last Through All Seasons: Our contemporary rose-printed bedding sheets & pillowcases aren't just ultra-soft and stylish, they're also designed to last all year round. Boasting a tough cotton & polyester blend, they're compatible with all seasons and will last through years of wear and tear without fading--no matter how many times you toss them in the washer. Adorn your bed with these floral bed sheets and sleep cozily no matter the temperature outside. Fits Modern Deep Pocket Mattresses: Tired of waking up to see your sheets have ridden up your mattress again? We've got you and your mattress covered with our deep pocket fitted sheet. Crafted to snugly fit today’s thick mattresses, we designed our fitted sheet with a full elastic perimeter that expands to fit securely. Our full size bed sheets include a 96" x 81" flat sheet, 54" x 75" x 14" fitted sheet, and two 20" x 40" pillowcases. A Family Operated Brand With Over 40 Years Experience: Our family-operated brand has created elegant home textiles for more than 40 years, with every item hand-designed by talented designers in our California studio. At the intersection of luxury and functionality, we source only high-quality materials to enhance your home with décor you can be proud of. Make Modern Threads your go-to interior design brand and completely upgrade your space into the elegant oasis of your dreams.
product_description: A Timeless Rose-Printed Sheets Set: Give your bedroom or guest bedroom an elegant upgrade with these vibrant rose-printed sheets. Crafted from 100% microfiber, they're soothing to the touch and won't lose their contemporary pattern no matter how many times you wash them. Our comfortable bedding set includes a flat sheet, fitted sheet, and silky pillowcases. Boasts Incredibly Soft Microfiber Fabric: Nestle comfortably inside these luxurious microfiber sheets every time you lay your head down at night. Crafted with a uniquely soft fabric and durable stitching, our sheets are made to last and won't fade through years of beautifully restful nights and regular washings. Made to Last All Year 'Round: Instead of changing your sheets to accommodate the weather, adorn your king-sized bed with our contemporary floral sheets during any season. Our breathable & durable bedding keeps you cool during warmer seasons and snuggled during cooler seasons. Make this supple set your go-to all year long! Fits Plush Deep-Pocket Mattresses: We designed our fitted sheet with deep pockets that snugly fit today’s thicker bed mattresses. Instead of placing the elastic just on the sides, we designed our fitted sheet with elastic around the entire perimeter to prevent it from riding up while you’re trying to rest. Dedicated To Providing Your Home With Luxurious Textiles: At Modern Threads, we've been dedicated to providing quality textiles at the intersection of luxury and functionality for over 40 years. As a family-owned brand, we understand your priorities in arranging a modern and comfortable home. That's why we source only the best materials and craft luxurious products to last for years to come. Every item is designed with care by our California studio team.
